markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Vampire Squid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=819)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Vampire squid are neither undead nor blood drinkers. Their name is instead inspired by their red eyes and the dark, cloak-like webbing between their arms. Living in the lightless depths of the ocean, the vampire squid can eject a cloud of bioluminescent mucus that nauseates predators.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Vampire Squid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=819)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 254 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 15

**Resistances**
cold 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +7 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tentacles +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Glowing Mucus** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** The vampire squid is in water; **Effect** The vampire squid ejects a cloud of bioluminescent mucus in a 15-foot cone. Non-squid creatures within the cloud must attempt a DC 16 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). The glowing mucus remains in the area for 1 minute, and any creature that ends its turn in the area must succeed at a DC 13 Fortitude save or become sickened 1.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-155" />
name: Vampire Squid

Living in the lightless depths of the ocean, the vampire squid can eject a cloud of bioluminescent mucus that nauseates predators.
